paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted BRCA2 variant information and penetrance data from a study on ovarian cancer in French Canadian women.

patients.demographics: 439 women with ovarian cancer, primarily French Canadian

functional_data.summary: The mutation is associated with a significant increase in risk for ovarian cancer.

variants.evidence_level: strong evidence for pathogenicity based on recurrence in the population.
variants.additional_notes: Identified in women with serous subtype tumours.
key_quotes: Mutations were identified in women with serous, endometrioid, mixed cell, and undifferentiated adenocarcinomas.
